column5: Doing some early research. Anyone have an experience with the above outfitter they would be willing to share? Camps, boats, motors, lakes and of course fishing.

Only once. We fished Simard and the adjacent lakes. The equipment and camp was good. The owners were very good. We were happy with the fishing. The portage lakes and the Guoin were better than Simard itself.

been with them many times. always a great time, never had any real problems. search on the site here, there have been a few different threads over the years. some review good, some not so much. once you pick a lake, let me know which one and I'll share anything i can about it.
I think this camp is on North West end of massive Gouin. I am guessing it is the least developed=good fishing.
